objects.name: Exploitation of Vulnerability Mitigation
objects.description: Update software regularly by employing patch management for internal enterprise endpoints and servers. Develop a robust cyber threat intelligence capability to determine what types and levels of threat may use software exploits and 0-days against a particular organization. Make it difficult for adversaries to advance their operation through exploitation of undiscovered or unpatched vulnerabilities by using sandboxing, virtualization, and exploit prevention tools such as the Microsoft Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit. (Citation: SRD EMET)

external_references.description: SRD Blog Author. (2014, July 31). Announcing EMET 5.0. Retrieved November 12, 2014.
